divs: Sighting DetailsI was looking out my window, looked up into the sky just for the hell of it. About 3 or 4 seconds after i looked, i saw a Blue circle like, disk shapped object fly by. It lasted for about 2-3 seconds. My first thought was a plane, but then i though that planes could not fly as fast as what i saw. My second theory was, a commet or shooting star, but i had never seen a blue commet or shooting star. So that only leaves one explination, a UFO. The Blue light disappeared from my sight after 2-3 seconds, it went over some trees and then disappeared.
trends: There have been 5 other sightings in Brooklyn Park
There were no other sightings in Brooklyn Park on or around November 11th 2008
